infotexts.jobdescription.chef_needs: The Chef is an expert cook, able to maintain an entire crew well fed.
infotexts.talentdescription.gordoomramsay: When above 50% health, gain 50% melee damage. When below 50%, gain 50% damage resistance.
infotexts.talentdescription.iamacookbut: When holding a ranged weapon, gain 25% ranged damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.gourmet: When you are Well Fed, gain 30% maximum health.
infotexts.talentdescription.powerfromwater: When you are Well Hydrated, gain 30% swimming speed and 15% movement speed.
infotexts.talentdescription.hydroponics: Unlock the ability to craft Hydroponic Tanks at a fabricator.
infotexts.talentdescription.advancedhydroponics: Unlock the ability to grow alien plants at a Hydroponic Tank.
infotexts.entitydescription.watercanteen: A resistant water canteen to hold your precious purified water.
infotexts.entitydescription.watercanteenempty: A resistant water canteen to hold your precious purified water, but this one is empty.
infotexts.entitydescription.ledouxenergydrink: A tasty drink to help you fight sleepiness.
infotexts.entitydescription.cookingstation_needs: An all around kitchen appliance allowing you to cook a grand variety of meals. Light enough to be moved elsewhere.
infotexts.entitydescription.portablestove: A small eletrical kicthen appliance used in the cooking of simple recipes.
infotexts.entitydescription.refrigerator_needs: A place to store you meats and drinks and prevent them from expiring.
infotexts.entitydescription.boombox_needs: A completly waterproof and wireless music player equipped with strong magnets allowing you to listen to any song anywhere !.
infotexts.entitydescription.chefcap: To show everyone who's the Chef !
infotexts.entitydescription.chefuniform: A comfortable and fire resistant uniform used by many cooks on Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.fryingpan_needs: A strong two-handed version of the classic frying pan used to cook a multitude of dishes.
infotexts.entitydescription.kitchenknife_needs: The most used tool in a kitchen, quite sharp tho.
infotexts.entitydescription.meatcleaver_needs: A strong blade used to chop meat and bones in a few strikes. Use this on a corpse to butcher it !
infotexts.entitydescription.cookingpot: Used for many cooking recipes, always have one nearby !
infotexts.entitydescription.handblender: A small kitchen tool used to grind, mix and crush many ingredients.
infotexts.entitydescription.hydroponictank: An advanced gardening device used in the groth of multiple vegetables.
infotexts.entitydescription.milk: Not really from a cow, but more from soja.
infotexts.entitydescription.apple: The fruit that started it all.
infotexts.entitydescription.cacao: Grind it and you will have some sweet chocolate !
infotexts.entitydescription.carot: Don't be confused : it's orange but it's not an orange
infotexts.entitydescription.coffeebeen: Crush it and boil it in a cooking pot and voilà ! Warm Coffee.
infotexts.entitydescription.grape: A wonderful fruit, sweet and slightly acidic.
infotexts.entitydescription.potato: Genetically engineered to be able to grow on vines and tree, technology is impressive !
infotexts.entitydescription.soja: Milk can be extracted from it.
infotexts.entitydescription.spicefruit: Do not try to eat it like that !
infotexts.entitydescription.strawberry: A delicious fruit, best served in a dessert.
infotexts.entitydescription.tomato: Many people think that's weird to put fruits on a pizza, but tomatoes are fruits !
infotexts.entitydescription.vanillaflower: Despite being vanilla this ingredient is clearly from a mod.
infotexts.entitydescription.weedleaf: I wonder why you grow this thing up ?
infotexts.entitydescription.wheat: Even in space we have wheat.
infotexts.entitydescription.rottedmeat: Don't even think about eating that !
infotexts.entitydescription.crawlermeat: This meat is kinda soft, yet it's still gross.
infotexts.entitydescription.hammerheadmeat: A strong and hard piece of meat, better to tenderized it.
infotexts.entitydescription.humanmeat: Eating the deads, is it reasonnable ?
infotexts.entitydescription.molochmeat: Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside.
infotexts.entitydescription.spinelingmeat: Let's hope no spike will grow in your stomach...
infotexts.entitydescription.mudraptormeat: People says that it taste like some sort of chicken, too bad you don't know what a chicken is...
infotexts.entitydescription.cookedcrawlermeat: Smell better when cooked, the taste however...
infotexts.entitydescription.cookedhumanmeat: Cooking it doesn't make it less human.
infotexts.entitydescription.cookedhuskedmeat: At least it stopped moving on it's own.
infotexts.entitydescription.cookedmolochmeat: A suprinsgly sweet texture, yet the taste is not that great.
infotexts.entitydescription.cookedspinelingmeat: Very tender when you remove all the spikes and cook it.
infotexts.entitydescription.cookedmudraptormeat: A fine piece of nature that you just cooked perfectly !
infotexts.entitydescription.cookedthreshermeat: No, cooking it doesn't make it easier to eat, but it better the taste.
infotexts.entitydescription.tincan: Used to preserve food and meal for years if not more.
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedfood: Not really a great meal, but it does fill your stomach. On the plus side it doesn't seems to expire, but don't ask how it's made...
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedcrawlermeat: At least the salt will cover the taste.
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedhammerheadmeat: The hard part is to chew it but to remove it from the can.
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedhumanmeat: "Even in death i am still served"
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedhuskedmeat: Suprisingly nourrishing and tasty, but let a strange rear taste in your mouth...
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedmudraptormeat: Maybe it got his chicken taste because those things eat a lot of people ?
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedspinelingmeat: Be careful when eating : you may hit a bone or twenty.
infotexts.entitydescription.cannedthreshermeat: More like a soup now since it hit the blender so many time.
infotexts.entitydescription.enableneeds: Can't be used while playing with NEEDS
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hunger: Keep your hunger low:\nIf it reaches 50% you will start to get negative effects and your body may not endure it...
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.hunger: The hunger was to much to bear...
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thirst: Keep your thirst low:\nIf it reaches 50% you will start to get negative effects and your body may not endure it...
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.thirst: So much water around, yet so thirsty...
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sleepaffliction: Keep your sleepiness low:\nIf it reaches 50% you will start to get negative effects and your body may not endure it...
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mood: Keep your mood in check:\nIf it reaches 50% you will start to get negative effects on your skills, so enjoy some good time!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.wellfed:
+10% swimming speed +10% melee attack speed +10% melee attack power
Hunger will progress slightly slowly
infotexts.afflictiondescription.wellhydrated:
+10% swimming speed +10% melee attack speed +10% melee attack power
Thirst will progress slightly slowly
infotexts.afflictiondescription.wellrested:
+5% swimming speed +5% melee attack speed +5% melee attack power
Sleepiness will progress slightly slowly
